incidents.name: Conversations Temporary Sync Issues in Ie1

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conversations in ie1 was degraded between 01:21:00 and 01:31:30 UTC, on 01/20/2025 in ie1. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delayed/missed real-time updates. This issue has been resolved.

incidents.name: Conversations Temporary Sync Issues in ie1

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conversations in ie1 was degraded for 7 minutes between 21:28:30 and 21:36:30 UTC, on 01/20/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced delayed/missed real-time updates. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Converstations. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Account Suspension From High Level

incident_updates.body:
On January 17, 2025, at 5:11 PM PST, Twilio executed a bulk suspension for High Level involving 16,702 subaccounts, mistakenly including some active customer parent accounts. This error disrupted SMS and Voice services for those affected. Initial ad hoc reactivations began within 12-18 hours, but complete restoration took 39 hours, concluding on January 20 at 8:01 AM PST.
The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Customers Unexpectedly Redirected to Twilio Login Page

incident_updates.body: Our Engineering team has determined that this issue does not have a major impact for customers and will be continuing to investigate and remediate the full root cause. If customers experience errors, we recommend that they try to clear cookies and retry to log in.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected potential Failures in Twilio sessions creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Call Failures From Subscribers to Jamaica Twilio Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting calls to Twilio Jamaica phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for calls to Twilio Twilio Jamaica phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing call failures to Twilio Jamaica phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing call failures to Twilio Jamaica phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing call failures to Twilio Jamaica phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with call failures from subscribers to Twilio phone numbers in Jamaica. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating the matter. We will provide updates as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue with Campaign Suspension without Customer Outreach issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with customers Campaigns. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Congo

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 290 minutes between 02:50 PST and 07:40 Pacific Time on 01/17/2025. During this period of time, customers may have experienced SMS delivery delays to the Orange network in Congo. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue causing SMS delivery delays to the Orange network in Congo. We will provide an update with customer impact details within the next two hours.

incidents.name: Content Template Builder Functionality Disruption

incident_updates.body: Template creation was degraded for 5 hours and 17 minutes between 09:01AM and 02:18PM Pacific Time on January 16th/2025. During this period of time, customers experienced 400 errors while trying to create templates through Console Builder UI. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Content Editor Template Creation Functionality Broken. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Access New Account Creation and MFA Reset Pages in Console

incident_updates.body: We have identified the root cause of the issue, preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We are working with our vendor partner to resolve the issue. We recommend that any customer using Chrome as the browser to log in retry using Edge as the browser. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Numbers From Denmark

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound calls to Twilio Denmark phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for inbound calls to Twilio numbers from Denmark. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing a subset of call failures to Twilio numbers from Denmark. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue on Denmark Twilio phone numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue with Numbers Integration issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no customer impact. All systems are operational.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Numbers Integration. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
